Enable Support Desk

VesselSDK comes with in build support desk as well as provides api’s to build your support desk.

Step 1: Built-in support desk

  1. To use built in support desk call following method by passing name of the Activity.
    2. VesselSDK.openFeedbackDialog(YourActivity.this);

    On successful integration you will see a support desk as below.

Enable Support Desk

VesselSDK comes with in build support desk as well as provides api’s to build your support desk.

Step 1: Built-in support desk

  1. To use built in support desk use the VesselInAppSupportViewController class.
    2. VesselInAppSupportViewController *inApp = [[VesselInAppSupportViewController alloc] init];
    [self presentViewController:inApp animated:YES completion:nil];;

    On successful integration you will see a support desk as below.

Step 2: Optional Configuration

Assign an object to the delegate property if you want to be notified when the user has finished with the interface and is ready to dismiss it. Or To set default message, use the message property as shown below.

VesselInAppSupportViewController *inApp = [[VesselInAppSupportViewController alloc] init];
    {inApp.message = @"Your feedback here...";
    inApp.delegate = self;
    [self presentViewController:inApp animated:YES completion:nil];}

Tells the delegate that the user has dismissed the mail composition view.

- (void) inAppSupportController:(VesselInAppSupportViewController*)controller
    didFinishWithResult:(VesselInAppSupportResult)result error:(NSError*)error {
        if (result == VesselInAppSupportResultSent) {
        // The view controller was dismissed by tapping on the 'Send' button.
        } else if (result == VesselInAppSupportResultCancelled) {
        // The view controller was dismissed by tapping on the 'Cancel' button
        }
    }
